headline.main: DAY RAIDERS TELL OF BERLIN ATTACK; British Fliers' Tones During Interview Suggest Idle Chat About Weather

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 31 -- The men who bombed Berlin by daylight for the first time in history told about it today in tones suggesting a teatime conversation about the weather.
abstract: Air Marshal Sir A T Harris lauds Berlin daylight raid crews
snippet: LONDON, Jan. 31 -- The men who bombed Berlin by daylight for the first time in history told about it today in tones suggesting a teatime conversation about the weather....

byline.original: By MILTON BRACKERWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
